price: (13) And there will not be for them among their [alleged] partners any intercessors, and they will [then] be disbelievers in their partners.
arabic: وَلَمۡ يَكُن لَّهُم مِّن شُرَكَآئِهِمۡ شُفَعَٰٓؤُاْ وَكَانُواْ بِشُرَكَآئِهِمۡ كَٰفِرِينَ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: walam yakun lahum min shurakāihim shufaʿāu wakānū bishurakāihim kāfirīna
